name: chisfis-template
description: A template for creating a Next.js application with Tailwind CSS and TypeScript.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && cd frontend && npm run build
scripts.build:clean: npm run cleanup && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.audit:full: npm run audit:backup && npm run lint
